name: psychoanalyst
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who examines or treats people using psychoanalysis (= a mental health treatment that works by trying to examine the unconscious mind): He is a psychoanalyst practising in Toronto. She has twice weekly sessions with her psychoanalyst. See
psychoanalyse
More examplesFewer examplesI went to medical school to become a psychoanalyst because I was interested in how the human mind works. Did you ask your doctor for a referral to a psychoanalyst?She is a psychoanalyst who often serves as an expert witness in court.
